info.name: Blogify API
info.description: This is the API documentation for the project Blogify. Here, you will find all the endpoints that exists in this project and their respective URLs. Also, the Request body, Response returned by each endpoint and the headers are defined here for your better understanding.

item.name: Authentication endpoints

request.description:
This endpoint allows users to create new accounts by submitting a valid request, which must include:

- name - A non empty string between 2 and 50 characters long
- email - A valid and unique email address
- password - A strong password which must contain at least 8 characters, one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and one special character
    

> Validation errors: 
  

- Name is empty
- Name isn't between 2 and 50 characters
- Invalid email
- Email taken
- Password didn't met the criteria
    

> `Warning: Can't signup while logged in.`

response.name: Invalid request: Fields validation failed
Invalid request: Already logged in

request.description:
This endpoint allows users to authenticate by submitting a valid request containing their credentials, which must include:

- email - A valid email address
- password - A strong password which must contain at least 8 characters, one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and one special character
    

> Validation errors: 
  

- Invalid email
- Invalid password
    

> `Warning: Can't signin while logged in.`

response.name: Invalid request: Already logged in

request.description: This endpoint allows users to logout of the system, clears the user's token from cookies, ensuring secure session termination and preventing unauthorized access to the user's account.

This endpoint allows users to refresh their access token by submitting a valid request, which must include:

- refreshToken - A vaild refresh token received after login
    

> Validation errors: 
  

- Invalid refresh token

request.description:
This endpoint allows users to get a link via email to reset their password by submitting a valid request, which must include:

- email - A valid email address that they used to open their account.
    

> Validation errors: 
  

- User with no such email exists
- Invalid email address

request.description:
This endpoint allows users to reset their password by submitting a valid request, which must include:

- resetToken - A vaild reset token received via email
- newPassword - A strong password which must contain at least 8 characters, one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and one special character
    

> Validation errors: 
  

- Reset token is empty
- New password doesn't meet criteria
- Invalid reset token

item.description: These endpoints facilitate secure user authentication and access control within the system. For these endpoints, the user does not need any authentication token in their request.

item.name: User endpoints

request.description:
This endpoint allows users to view publicly available profile information of various users. For this, the request must have a user id passed as a parameter of the URL.

> Validation errors: 
  

- User not found

header.value: __cf_bm=zULCc_.K5LJbq7UKNRvxowoT6u2wl0ReFgCx5fxeDAo-1684677972-0-AdkS/fiRBWFr1YjXk6tyDui8GMbgqtyrl2j6WKFOAnuDbiL0TBq35XlZvgKUJ2L+FDpXLE9LnQifLrnrXKMJYss=; path=/; expires=Sun, 21-May-23 14:36:12 GMT; domain=.onrender.com; HttpOnly; Secure; SameSite=None

__cf_bm=QfvrmMJPig0JF3WtIoKvBqPbiCP4q9S7d6Tx8kbHWns-1684677930-0-AVLtJ8O09mpGmUx2z9UCSpetH35BUqqASfz7pahDdclbl5lkZRRdMX5iGar4sYuyJXQd3gtEXTwIDIAewDXgknI=; path=/; expires=Sun, 21-May-23 14:35:30 GMT; domain=.onrender.com; HttpOnly; Secure; SameSite=None

request.description:
##### `This endpoint is protected and requires auth token in the cookies.`

This endpoint allows users to update their profile information. For this, the request must have their `user id` passed as a parameter of the URL. The request must contain certain information that the users wants to update, which must include:

- name (Required) - A non empty string between 2 and 50 characters long
- email (Required) - A valid and unique email address
- gender (Optional) - A non empty string
- birthDate (Optional) - A valid date string
- bio (Optional) - A non empty string that is less than 500 characters
    

The request body must also contain their `password` which is used for verification.

> `Warning: The required fields must always be sent in the request whether they are updated or not. The optional fields will be set to null if they are not sent in the request.` 
  
> Validation errors: 
  

- Not the owner of the account
- Name is empty
- Name isn't between 2 and 50 characters
- Email is invalid
- Email already taken
- Password is invalid
- Gender is empty
- Birth date is empty
- Bio is empty
- Bio is too big

request.description:
##### `This endpoint is protected and requires auth token in the cookies.`

This endpoint allows users to update their password For this, the request must have their `user id` passed as a parameter of the URL. The request must include:

- oldPassword - The old or current password of the user
- newPassword - The new password which must be at least 8 characters, one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and one special character
    

> Validation errors: 
  

- Not the owner of the account
- New password should not be the same as old password
- Old password is invalid
- New password doesn't meet criteria

request.description:
##### `This endpoint is protected and requires auth token in the cookies.`

This endpoint allows users to update their profile picture. For this, the request must have their `user id` passed as a parameter of the URL. The request must contain:

- profileImage - An image file in jpg, jpeg or png format that is less than 5MB
    

> `Warning: If no image is sent in the request then the profile picture in removed from the account.` 
  
> Validation errors: 
  

- Not the owner of the account

request.description:
##### `This endpoint is protected and requires auth token in the cookies.`

This endpoint allows users to update their profile's cover picture. For this, the request must have their `user id` passed as a parameter of the URL. The request must contain:

- coverImage - An image file in jpg, jpeg or png format that is less than 5MB
    

> `Warning: If no image is sent in the request then the cover picture in removed from the account.` 
  
> Validation errors: 
  

- Not the owner of the account

request.description:
##### `This endpoint is protected and requires auth token in the cookies.`

This endpoint allows users to delete their profile and all it's associated data. For this, the request must have their `user id` passed as a parameter of the URL. The request must contain:

- password - The user's current password which is used for verification
    

> Validation errors:
- Not the owner of the account
- Wrong password

item.description: These endpoints provide a range of functionalities for managing user profiles, including displaying profile information, updating various informations in their profile and deleting their account.

item.name: Blog endpoints

request.description:
##### `This endpoint is protected and requires auth token in the cookies.`

This endpoint allows users to create a blog post by submitting a valid request, which must include:

- title (Required) - A non empty string between 1 - 200 characters
- content (Required) - A non empty string between 1 - 5000 characters
- coverImage (Optional) - An image file in jpg, jpeg or png format that is less than 5MB
    

> Validation errors: 
  

- Title doesn't meet cricriteria
- Content doesn't meet cricriteria

request.description:
This endpoint allows users to fetch a blog post. For this, the request must have the `blog id` passed as a parameter of the URL.

> Validation errors: 
  

- Blog not found

request.description: This endpoint allows users to fetch a paginated list of blog posts. For this, the request must have a `page number` and a `limit` as a query parameter in the URL.

request.description: This endpoint allows users to fetch a paginated list of blog posts created by certain user. For this, the request must have the `user id` passed as a parameter of the URL and a `page number` and a `limit` as a query parameter in the URL.

header.value: __cf_bm=z4VAv_mprlTfmHOVLEBT92Ee54Z1_1mzhfotnmMEQPo-1684748353-0-AWGbJtNhi6io6nzkhs2jxe6dcJQJexakntv4LKnHveYvbxErFlg0Wrf3gTUuEtpId4WZsoqCoABr5HbQoPi7XPA=; path=/; expires=Mon, 22-May-23 10:09:13 GMT; domain=.onrender.com; HttpOnly; Secure; SameSite=None

request.description:
##### `This endpoint is protected and requires auth token in the cookies.`

This endpoint allows users to update their blog post by submitting a valid request. The request must have the `blog id` passed as a parameter of the URL. The request must include:

- title (Required) - A non empty string between 1 - 200 characters
- content (Required) - A non empty string between 1 - 5000 characters
- coverImage (Optional) - An image file in jpg, jpeg or png format that is less than 5MB
    

> `Warning: If cover image is not sent then it will be removed form the blog post after update. To avoid this, send the previous cover image url as a string in the request.` 
  
> Validation errors: 
  

- Title doesn't meet cricriteria
- Content doesn't meet cricriteria
- Not the owner of the blog
- Blog not found

request.description:
##### `This endpoint is protected and requires auth token in the cookies.`

This endpoint allows users to like a blog post or remove previously given like. The request must have the `blog id` passed as a parameter of the URL.
    
  
> Validation errors: 
  

- Blog not found

This endpoint allows users to detele their blog post. The request must have the `blog id` passed as a parameter of the URL.

> Validation errors: 
  

- Not the owner of the blog

item.description: These endpoints provide a range of blog post related functionalities like creating, updating, deleting, fetching and liking blog posts.

item.name: Comment endpoints

request.description:
##### `This endpoint is protected and requires auth token in the cookies.`

This endpoint allows users to create a blog comment by submitting a valid request, which must include:

- blogId (Required) - The id of the blog for which the comment is being created
- text (Required) - A non empty string that is less than 500 characters
- parentId (Optional) - The id of the parent comment if the post is a reply
    

> Validation errors: 
  

- Blog id is required
- Text doesn't meet criteria
- Blog not found
- Parent comment not found

request.description:
##### `This endpoint is protected and requires auth token in the cookies.`

This endpoint allows users to update a comment by submitting a valid request. The request must have the `comment id` passed as a parameter of the URL. The request must also include:

- text (Required) - A non empty string
    

> Validation errors: 
  

- Text is empty
- Comment not found
- Not the owner of the comment

item.description: These endpoints provide a range of blog comment related functionalities like creating, updating, deleting, fetching and liking blog comments.

item.name: Search endpoints

request.description: This endpoint allows users to fetch a paginated list of users by name. For this, the request must have the `user name` passed as a parameter of the URL and a `page number` and a `limit` as a query parameter in the URL. The search is substring search meaning the searched word can be a substring of the result.

header.value: __cf_bm=AB.HylJXzhh0eqW2KiFjcTYiu27nWpDqjBOrjvhgdSI-1684750674-0-AZevI9jDExDt5v4eWI5Y8fUvpc8PuxTjh594vBl48eqeiMtBUizrMlocdAazLu2zIBZFTGC6+9ld17XGRyXdjDI=; path=/; expires=Mon, 22-May-23 10:47:54 GMT; domain=.onrender.com; HttpOnly; Secure; SameSite=None

request.description: This endpoint allows users to fetch a paginated list of blogs by title. For this, the request must have the `blog title` passed as a parameter of the URL and a `page number` and a `limit` as a query parameter in the URL. The search is substring search meaning the searched word can be a substring of the result.

item.description: These endpoints provide a range of searching related functionalities like searching for users by name and searching for blogs by title.
